verses.t: Praise{H1984} Lordye the {H3050}: for it is good{H2896} to sing praises{H2167} unto our God{H430}; for it is pleasant{H5273}; and praise{H8416} is comely{H5000}.
LordThe {H3068} doth build up{H1129} Jerusalem{H3389}: he gathereth together{H3664} the outcasts{H1760} of Israel{H3478}.
He healeth{H7495} the broken{H7665} in heart{H3820}, and bindeth up{H2280} their wounds{H6094}.wounds: Heb. griefs
He telleth{H4487} the number{H4557} of the stars{H3556}; he calleth{H7121} them all by their names{H8034}.
Great{H1419} is our Lord{H113}, and of great{H7227} power{H3581}: his understanding{H8394} is infinite{H4557}.his…: Heb. of his understanding there is no number
LordThe {H3068} lifteth up{H5749} the meek{H6035}: he casteth{H8213} the wicked{H7563} down{H8213} to the ground{H776}.
Sing{H6030} Lordunto the {H3068} with thanksgiving{H8426}; sing praise{H2167} upon the harp{H3658} unto our God{H430}:
Who covereth{H3680} the heaven{H8064} with clouds{H5645}, who prepareth{H3559} rain{H4306} for the earth{H776}, who maketh grass{H2682} to grow{H6779} upon the mountains{H2022}.
He giveth{H5414} to the beast{H929} his food{H3899}, and to the young{H1121} ravens{H6158} which cry{H7121}.
He delighteth{H2654} not in the strength{H1369} of the horse{H5483}: he taketh not pleasure{H7521} in the legs{H7785} of a man{H376}.
LordThe {H3068} taketh pleasure{H7521} in them that fear{H3373} him, in those that hope{H3176} in his mercy{H2617}.
Praise{H7623} Lordthe {H3068}, O Jerusalem{H3389}; praise{H1984} thy God{H430}, O Zion{H6726}.
For he hath strengthened{H2388} the bars{H1280} of thy gates{H8179}; he hath blessed{H1288} thy children{H1121} within{H7130} thee.
He maketh{H7760} peace{H7965} in thy borders{H1366}, and filleth{H7646} thee with the finest{H2459} of the wheat{H2406}.He…: Heb. Who maketh thy border peacefinest…: Heb. fat of wheat
He sendeth forth{H7971} his commandment{H565} upon earth{H776}: his word{H1697} runneth{H7323} very swiftly{H4120}.
He giveth{H5414} snow{H7950} like wool{H6785}: he scattereth{H6340} the hoarfrost{H3713} like ashes{H665}.
He casteth forth{H7993} his ice{H7140} like morsels{H6595}: who can stand{H5975} before{H6440} his cold{H7135}?
He sendeth out{H7971} his word{H1697}, and melteth{H4529} them: he causeth his wind{H7307} to blow{H5380}, and the waters{H4325} flow{H5140}.
He sheweth{H5046} his word{H1697} unto Jacob{H3290}, his statutes{H2706} and his judgments{H4941} unto Israel{H3478}.his word: Heb. his words
He hath not dealt{H6213} so with any nation{H1471}: and as for his judgments{H4941}, they have not known{H3045} them. Praise{H1984} Lordye the {H3050}.
